name: Feed the Lads
description:
Use the A-D keys to move your sausage, and press the space bar to release the sausage!

Get it into the bun to feed a lad. 1 lad fed = 1 like!!!

--

This is an early proof of concept. Lots and lots of glaring issues will be found. If you wish to comment, please leave comments on the mechanics and the loop itself. Any bugs are good to know too :)

Known issues

  • Obstacles can block the goal
  • Sausage should probably reset location if it goes outside the bounds of the camera
  • Obstacles should maybe not spawn too high up the play area so as to not hinder the initial positioning of the sausage.
